content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>  <mods xmlns="http://www.loc.gov/mods/v3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.loc.gov/mods/v3 http://www.loc.gov/standards/mods/v3/mods-3-4.xsd">    <titleInfo>       <title>Annotation evolution: how Web 2.0 technologies are enabling a change in annotation practice</title>    </titleInfo>    <name type="personal" ID="ss4662">       <namePart type="family">Sacchi</namePart>       <namePart type="given">Simone</namePart>       <role>          <roleTerm type="text">author</roleTerm>       </role>       <affiliation>Columbia University. Center for Digital Research and Scholarship</affiliation>    </name>    <name type="corporate">       <namePart>Columbia University. Libraries and Information Services</namePart>       <role>          <roleTerm type="text">originator</roleTerm>       </role>    </name>    <extension xmlns:rioxxterms="http://docs.rioxx.net/schema/v1.0/rioxxterms/" xmlns="http://www.loc.gov/mods/v3" xsi:schemaLocation="http://docs.rioxx.net/schema/v1.0/rioxxterms/ http://docs.rioxx.net/schema/v1.0/rioxxterms.xsd">     </extension>    <typeOfResource>text</typeOfResource>    <genre>Presentations</genre>    <originInfo>       <dateIssued encoding="w3cdtf" keyDate="yes">2011</dateIssued>    </originInfo>    <language>       <languageTerm type="text">English</languageTerm>    </language>    <abstract>Are Web 2.0 tools and technologies changing how and why scholars annotate their research sources? We begin to answer this question by assessing current technology and tools that support new functions for one of the most common scholarly research activity: taking notes. The results suggest a new approach to personalized information retrieval.</abstract>    <note>The poster image for this abstract is available in Academic Commons at http://dx.doi.org/10.7916/D8DR2SMP</note>    <subject>       <topic>Information science</topic>    </subject>    <relatedItem type="host">       <titleInfo>          <title>Proceedings of the 2011 iConference</title>       </titleInfo>       <part>          <extent unit="page">             <start>765</start>             <end>766</end>          </extent>       </part>       <identifier type="doi">10.1145/1940761.1940898</identifier>    </relatedItem>    <identifier type="CDRS doi">http://dx.doi.org/10.7916/D8JH3JBD</identifier>    <location>       <physicalLocation authority="marcorg">NNC</physicalLocation>    </location>    <recordInfo>       <recordContentSource authority="marcorg">NNC</recordContentSource>       <recordCreationDate encoding="w3cdtf">2014-07-02 17:30:30 -0400</recordCreationDate>       <recordChangeDate encoding="w3cdtf">2014-07-02 18:26:27 -0400</recordChangeDate>       <recordIdentifier>14691</recordIdentifier>       <languageOfCataloging>          <languageTerm authority="iso639-2b">eng</languageTerm>       </languageOfCataloging>    </recordInfo> </mods>
